name: Pip Seeker
description:
Join Pip's mission to rescue helpless alien creatures as she travels through four colorful, otherworldly planets! There are many enemies to defeat, unique creatures to save, and puzzling platforms to navigate through! 

  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Point & click to aim at and shoot enemies
  • Rescue all of the creatures to go to the next level

Credits
Music: 

Eric Skiff - Song Name - Underclocked - Available at http://ericskiff.com/music

Density & Time - MAZE

Kevin MacLeod - 8bit Dungeon Boss

And others!

Art:
I created all of the characters, the square cloud tiles, blue tile, door, lasers, explosion, health stars, coins, main menu/Game Over/Game win splash screens.
The rest of the work used was copyright free.
